audioText: Le contrat signée par la directrice était obscur et difficile à comprendre pour les employés.
question: How was the contract signed by the director?
options: It was obscure and difficult for employees to understand
It was clear and easy for everyone to follow
It was incomplete and needed more details
It was perfect and satisfied all requirements
explanation: The text states 'Le contrat signée par la directrice était obscur et difficile à comprendre pour les employés' - The contract signed by the director was obscure and difficult for employees to understand. The past participle 'signée' (signed) and adjective 'obscur' (obscure) describe contract complexity.
